sentences.sContent: They are still temporizing in the face of what can only be described as a disaster.
sentences.sCn: 眼看着灾难来临，他们还在拖延时间。

synos.tran: 拖延；妥协；顺应时势；迎合潮流

words.tran: 姑息者；骑墙主义者；顺应时势者；见风使舵的人
顺应时势；迎合潮流；妥协；拖延（等于temporize）

trans.tranOther: to delay or avoid making a decision in order to gain time
